short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Reads is a powerful tool that revolutionizes your website reading experience by zoom features and notes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝙎𝙞𝙢𝙥𝙡𝙚 𝙍𝙚𝙖𝙙𝙨 𝙞𝙨 𝙖 𝙥𝙤𝙬𝙚𝙧𝙛𝙪𝙡 𝙩𝙤𝙤𝙡 𝙩𝙝𝙖𝙩 𝙧𝙚𝙫𝙤𝙡𝙪𝙩𝙞𝙤𝙣𝙞𝙯𝙚𝙨 𝙮𝙤𝙪𝙧 𝙬𝙚𝙗𝙨𝙞𝙩𝙚 𝙧𝙚𝙖𝙙𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙚𝙭𝙥𝙚𝙧𝙞𝙚𝙣𝙘𝙚, 𝙖𝙡𝙡𝙤𝙬𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙮𝙤𝙪 𝙩𝙤 𝙛𝙤𝙘𝙪𝙨 𝙤𝙣 𝙩𝙝𝙚 𝙢𝙤𝙨𝙩 𝙘𝙧𝙞𝙩𝙞𝙘𝙖𝙡 𝙡𝙞𝙣𝙚𝙨. 𝙒𝙞𝙩𝙝 𝙞𝙩𝙨 𝙪𝙣𝙞𝙦𝙪𝙚 𝙛𝙚𝙖𝙩𝙪𝙧𝙚𝙨, 𝙮𝙤𝙪 𝙘𝙖𝙣 𝙘𝙪𝙨𝙩𝙤𝙢𝙞𝙯𝙚 𝙩𝙝𝙚 𝙣𝙪𝙢𝙗𝙚𝙧 𝙤𝙛 𝙫𝙞𝙨𝙞𝙗𝙡𝙚 𝙡𝙞𝙣𝙚𝙨 𝙖𝙣𝙙 𝙖𝙥𝙥𝙡𝙮 𝙖 𝙗𝙡𝙪𝙧 𝙚𝙛𝙛𝙚𝙘𝙩 𝙩𝙤 𝙩𝙝𝙚 𝙧𝙚𝙨𝙩 𝙤𝙛 𝙩𝙝𝙚 𝙘𝙤𝙣𝙩𝙚𝙣𝙩, 𝙚𝙣𝙨𝙪𝙧𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙤𝙥𝙩𝙞𝙢𝙪𝙢 𝙧𝙚𝙖𝙙𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙘𝙤𝙣𝙘𝙚𝙣𝙩𝙧𝙖𝙩𝙞𝙤𝙣.


𝑲𝒆𝒚 𝒇𝒆𝒂𝒕𝒖𝒓𝒆𝒔:

𝐅𝐨𝐜𝐮𝐬 𝐎𝐩𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬: Tailor your reading environment with customizable settings that allow you to choose the number of lines displayed. Press Enable to instantly blur other lines of text when you click on a specific section, ensuring a distraction-free reading experience tailored to your preferences.

𝐙𝐨𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐂𝐚𝐩𝐚𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲: Personalize your reading further with the ability to adjust the font size and scale of the visible lines. 

𝐒𝐞𝐚𝐦𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐍𝐨𝐭𝐞-𝐓𝐚𝐤𝐢𝐧𝐠: Take notes directly within the website, effortlessly capturing your thoughts and ideas. All your notes are conveniently saved on the side panel, synchronized across devices, and backed up to your Google Docs account.

𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲 𝐍𝐚𝐯𝐢𝐠𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: Never lose track of your notes. Simply click on a message, and the screen smoothly scrolls back to the exact position where the letter was taken. 

𝐒𝐲𝐧𝐜 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐆𝐨𝐨𝐠𝐥𝐞 𝐃𝐨𝐜𝐬: Your notes are securely stored with your Google Docs account. Each note is saved as a separate document, labeled with the website's link as the title, ensuring easy organization and accessibility. If you go back and take more notes later on the same website, it will be added to your previous history on the website and to the Google document with the associated email.
